channel.title: Hi, Dipankar here. Here to learn more!
channel.description:
Hey guys,
This is Dipankar, ( http://desinerd.com and well, http://dipankar.name) have been building things/products for quite sometime but never really got down to building solo stuff (and consequently monetizing it). Hope to breakthrough this limitation! I have done quite a bit of consulting to help other build things as well, but don't find that to be sustainable by design.
Hope to learn from the experiences of others and help whoever i can!

Right now in Delhi (India), planning to shift base soon.
